question.title: What is the primary purpose of the Berg Equilibrium Scale?
question.description: A clinical tool used to assess balance and walking abilities

option_a.title: To measure walking speed
option_a.description: A 6-minute walk test is used to assess walking speed and endurance

option_b.title: To evaluate balance and walking abilities
option_b.description: A clinical tool used to assess balance and walking abilities

option_c.title: To diagnose frontal and sagittal posture
option_c.description: A postural test used to assess frontal and sagittal posture

option_d.title: To classify functional ambulation
option_d.description: A classification system used to assess functional ambulation

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The correct letter corresponding to the correct option
